dmca.title: [AB-C37657B] Copyrighted Material
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Tony Nguyen [mailto:Tony.Nguyen@Apress.com] 
Posted At: Monday, June 26, 2006 3:11 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [AB-C37657B] Copyrighted Material
Subject: RE: [AB-C37657B] Copyrighted Material


Dear Sir/Madame:

The original email was to inform the owner of ebooksportal.org, Dang
Truong, to cease operation in providing links to copyrighted materials
pertaining to Apress, Inc. You were informed to assist in enforcing
illegal activities since you are providing internet services for
ebooksportal.org.

Regards,

Tony Nguyen



-----Original Message-----
From: Copyright [mailto:Copyright@theplanet.com]
Sent: Monday, June 26, 2006 12:35 PM
To: Tony Nguyen
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: FW: [AB-C37657B] Copyrighted Material

 To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At:

Thank you, 

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc. 
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
To whom it may concern: 
 
  
 
  
 
I am writing to you on behalf of Apress, Inc. regarding copyrighted
material posted on your site. We have found 10 Apress ebook links from
your site. Apress, Inc. holds ALL the publications rights both in print
and electronic form and we must insist in the strongest possible terms
that you remove it from your website immediately as its continued
posting constitutes copyright infringement pursuant to Title 17, Section
512(f) of the United States Code. 
 
  
 
The links aforementioned are listed below: 
 
  
 
http://www.ebooksportal.org/2006/06/25/practical-mono/ 
 
http://www.ebooksportal.org/2006/06/25/pro-sql-server-2005-assemblies/ 
 
http://www.ebooksportal.org/2006/06/21/beginning-excel-what-if-data-anal
ysis-tools/ 
 
http://www.ebooksportal.org/2006/06/18/wimax-operators-manual-building-8
0216-wireless-networks-2nd-edition/ 
 
http://www.ebooksportal.org/2006/06/17/sql-server-2000-fast-answers-for-
dbas-and-developers-apress/ 
 
http://www.ebooksportal.org/2006/06/16/the-definitive-guide-to-windows-i
nstaller/ 
 
http://www.ebooksportal.org/2006/06/15/software-project-secrets-why-soft
ware-projects-fail-2/ 
 
http://www.ebooksportal.org/2006/06/13/pro-net-20-code-and-design-standa
rds-in-c-sharp-3rd-edition/ 
 
http://www.ebooksportal.org/2006/06/10/handbook-of-nature-inspired-and-i
nnovative-computing-integrating-classical-models-with-emerging-technolog
ies/ 
 
http://www.ebooksportal.org/2006/06/07/sql-server-2005-t-sql-recipes-apr
ess/ 
 
  
 
  
 
Sincerely, 
 
  
 
  
 
Apress, Inc. 
 
2560 Ninth Street, Suite 219 
 
Berkeley, CA 94710
